title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 33 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 33 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Rejoice in the LORD, O ye righteous: for praise is comely for the upright.
lineList.cn: 义人哪，你们应当靠耶和华欢乐。正直人的赞美是合宜的。

lineList.en: Praise the LORD with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.
lineList.cn: 你们应当弹琴称谢耶和华，用十弦瑟歌颂他。

lineList.en: Sing unto him a new song; play skilfully with a loud noise.
lineList.cn: 应当向他唱新歌，弹得巧妙，声音洪亮。

lineList.en: For the word of the LORD is right; and all his works are done in truth.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华的言语正直。凡他所作的，尽都诚实。

lineList.en: He loveth righteousness and judgment: the earth is full of the goodness of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 他喜爱仁义公平。遍地满了耶和华的慈爱。

lineList.en: By the word of the LORD were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.
lineList.cn: 诸天藉耶和华的命而造，万象藉他口中的气而成。

lineList.en: He gathereth the waters of the sea together as an heap: he layeth up the depth in storehouses.
lineList.cn: 他聚集海水如垒，收藏深洋在库房。

lineList.en: Let all the earth fear the LORD: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
lineList.cn: 愿全地都敬畏耶和华。愿世上的居民，都惧怕他。

lineList.en: For he spake, and it was done; he commanded, and it stood fast.
lineList.cn: 因为他说有，就有。命立，就立。

lineList.en: The LORD bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: he maketh the devices of the people of none effect.
lineList.cn: 耶和华使列国的寿算归于无有，使众民的思念无有功效。

lineList.en: The counsel of the LORD standeth for ever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的寿算永远立定，他心中的思念万带常存。

lineList.en: Blessed is the nation whose God is the LORD; and the people whom he hath chosen for his own inheritance.
lineList.cn: 以耶和华为神的，那国是有福的。他所拣选为自己产业的，那民是有福的。

lineList.en: The LORD looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.
lineList.cn: 耶和华从天上观看。他看见一切的世人。

lineList.en: From the place of his habitation he looketh upon all the inhabitants of the earth.
lineList.cn: 从他的居所，往外察看地上的居民。

lineList.en: He fashioneth their hearts alike; he considereth all their works.
lineList.cn: 他是那造成他们众人心的，留意他们一切作为的。

lineList.en: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength.
lineList.cn: 君王不能因兵多得胜。勇士不能因力大得救。

lineList.en: An horse is a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any by his great strength.
lineList.cn: 靠马得救是枉然的。马也不能因力大救人。

lineList.en: Behold, the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;
lineList.cn: 耶和华的眼目，看顾敬畏他的人，和仰望他慈爱的人，

lineList.en: To deliver their soul from death, and to keep them alive in famine.
lineList.cn: 要救他们的命脱离死亡，并使他们在饥荒中存活。

lineList.en: Our soul waiteth for the LORD: he is our help and our shield.
lineList.cn: 我们的心向来等候耶和华。他是我们的帮助，我们的盾牌。

lineList.en: For our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.
lineList.cn: 我们的心必靠他欢喜，因为我们向来倚靠他的圣名。

lineList.en: Let thy mercy, O LORD, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你照着我们所仰望你的，向我们施行慈爱。
